attributes.action: Stop paying child benefits for any child that a person has after their third
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is wrong to give someone benefits after they have had over 3 children, at the end of the day if they can not afford to have anymore then 3 children why do they, (because they know that they would be on moer money then the average working person) why should the tax payers have to pay for them
